original: pareṇa mṛtyumatikrānto bhātyevaṃ ha vā enameṣā devatā mṛtyumativahati ya evam
analyzed: pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntaḥ bhāti evam ha vai enam eṣā devatā mṛtyum ativahati yaḥ evam
veda

original: athātmane'nnādyamāgāyat yaddhi kiṃ cānnamadyate'nenaiva tadadyata iha
analyzed: atha ātmane annādyam āgāyat yat hi kim ca annam adyate anena eva tat adyate iha

original: pratitiṣṭhati 14.4.1.19
analyzed: pratitiṣṭhati

original: te devā abruvan etāvadvā idaṃ sarvaṃ yadannaṃ tadātmana āgāsīranu no'sminnanna
analyzed: te devāḥ abruvan etāvat vai idam sarvam yat annam tat ātmane āgāsīḥ anu naḥ asmin anna

original: ābhajasveti te vai mābhisamviśateti tatheti taṃ samantam pariṇyaviśanta
analyzed: ābhajasva iti te vai mā abhisamviśata iti tathā iti tam samantam pariṇyaviśanta

original: tasmādyadanenānnamatti tenaitāstṛpyantyevaṃ ha vā enaṃ svā abhisamviśanti bhartā
analyzed: tasmāt yat anena annam atti tena etāḥ tṛpyanti evam ha vai enam svāḥ abhisamviśanti bhartā

original: svānāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ puraetā bhavatyannādo'dhipatirya evam veda 14.4.1.20
analyzed: svānām śreṣṭhaḥ puraetā bhavati anna ādaḥ adhipatiḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: ya u haivamvidam sveṣu pratipratirbubhūṣati na haivālam bhāryebhyo bhavatyatha
analyzed: yaḥ u ha evamvidam sveṣu pratipratiḥ bubhūṣati na ha eva alam bhāryebhyaḥ bhavati atha

original: ya evaitamanu bhavati yo vaitamanu bhāryānbubhūrṣati sa haivālam bhāryebhyo
analyzed: yaḥ eva etam anu bhavati yaḥ vā etam anu bhāryān bubhūrṣati sa ha eva alam bhāryebhyaḥ

original: bhavati 14.4.1.21
analyzed: bhavati

original: so'yāsya āṅiraso aṅgānāṃ hi rasaḥ prāṇo vā aṅgānāṃ rasaḥ prāṇo hi vā aṅgānāṃ
analyzed: saḥ ayāsyaḥ āṅirasaḥ aṅgānām hi rasaḥ prāṇaḥ vai aṅgānām rasaḥ prāṇaḥ hi vai aṅgānām

original: rasastasmādyasmātkasmāccāṅgātprāṇa utkrāmati tadeva tacuṣyatyeṣa hi vā aṅgānāṃ
analyzed: rasaḥ tasmāt yasmāt kasmāt ca aṅgāt prāṇaḥ utkrāmati tat eva tacuṣyati eṣa hi vai aṅgānām
rasaḥ

original: eṣa u eva bṛhaspatiḥ vāgvai bṛhatī tasyā eṣa patistasmādu bṛhaspatiḥ 14.4.1.23
analyzed: eṣaḥ u eva bṛhaspatiḥ vāc vai bṛhatī tasyāḥ eṣa patiḥ tasmāt u bṛhaspatiḥ

original: eṣa u eva brahmaṇaspatiḥ vāgvai brahma tasyā eṣa patistasmādu ha brahmaṇaspatiḥ 14.4.1.24
analyzed: eṣaḥ u eva brahmaṇaspatiḥ vāc vai brahma tasyāḥ eṣa patiḥ tasmāt u ha brahmaṇaspatiḥ

original: eṣa u eva sāma vāgvai sāmaiṣa sā cāmaśceti tatsāmnaḥ sāmatvaṃ yadveva samaḥ
analyzed: eṣaḥ u eva sāma vāc vai sāma eṣa sā ca amaḥ ca iti tat sāmnaḥ sāma tvam yat u eva samaḥ

original: pluṣiṇā samo maśakena samo nāgena sama ebhistribhirlokaiḥ samo'nena sarveṇa
analyzed: pluṣiṇā samaḥ maśakena samaḥ nāgena samaḥ ebhiḥ tribhiḥ lokaiḥ samaḥ anena sarveṇa

original: tasmādveva sāmāśnute sāmnaḥ sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ ya evametatsāma veda 14.4.1.25

analyzed: eṣaḥ u vai udgīthaḥ prāṇaḥ vai ud prāṇena hi idam sarvam uttabdham vāc eva gīthā ucca

original: gīthā ceti sa udgīthaḥ 14.4.1.26
analyzed: gīthā ca iti saḥ udgīthaḥ

original: taddhāpi brahmadattaścaikitāneyo rājānam bhakṣayannuvācāyaṃ tyasya rājā
analyzed: tat ha api brahmadattaḥ caikitāneyaḥ rājānam bhakṣayan uvāca ayam tyasya rājā

original: mūrdhānam vipātayatādyadito'yāsya āṅgiraso'nyenodagāyaditi vācā ca hyeva sa
analyzed: mūrdhānam vipātayatāt yat itas ayāsyaḥ āṅgirasaḥ anyena udagāyat iti vācā ca hi eva sa

original: prāṇena codagāyaditi 14.4.1.27
analyzed: prāṇena ca udagāyat iti

original: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ svam veda bhavati hāsya svaṃ tasya vai svara eva svaṃ
analyzed: tasya ha etasya sāmnaḥ yaḥ svam veda bhavati ha asya svam tasya vai svaraḥ eva svam

original: tasmādārtvijyaṃ kariṣyanvāci svaramiceta tayā vācā svarasampannayārtvijyaṃ

original: kuryāttasmādyajñe svaravantaṃ didṛkṣanta evātho yasya svam bhavati bhavati hāsya
analyzed: kuryāt tasmāt yajñe svaravantam didṛkṣante eva atha u yasya svam bhavati bhavati ha asya

original: svam ya evametatsāmanaḥ svam veda 14.4.1.28
analyzed: svam yaḥ evam etat sāmanaḥ svam veda

analyzed: tasya ha etasya sāmnaḥ yaḥ suvarṇam veda bhavati ha asya suvarṇam tasya vai svaraḥ eva

original: suvarṇam bhavati hāsya suvarṇaṃ ya evametatsāmnaḥ suvarṇam veda 14.4.1.29
analyzed: suvarṇam bhavati ha asya suvarṇam yaḥ evam etat sāmnaḥ suvarṇam veda

original: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ pratiṣṭhām veda prati ha tiṣṭhati tasya vai vāgeva
analyzed: tasya ha etasya sāmnaḥ yaḥ pratiṣṭhām veda prati ha tiṣṭhati tasya vai vāc eva

original: athātaḥ pavamānānāmevābhyārohaḥ sa vai khalu prastotā sāma prastauti sa yatra
analyzed: atha atas pavamānānām eva abhyārohaḥ sa vai khalu prastotā sāma prastauti sa yatra

original: prastyuāttadetāni japedasato mā sadgamaya tamaso mā jyotirgamaya mṛtyormāmṛtaṃ

original: gamayeti 14.4.1.31

original: sa yadāhāsato mā sadgamayeti mṛtyurvā asatsadamṛtam mṛtyormāmṛtaṃ

analyzed: gamaya amṛtam mā kuru iti eva etat āha

analyzed: tamasaḥ mā jyotiḥ gamaya iti mṛtyuḥ vai tamaḥ jyotiḥ amṛtam mṛtyoḥ mā amṛtam

analyzed: gamaya amṛtam mā kuru iti eva etat āha mṛtyoḥ mā amṛtam gamaya iti na atra tirohitam iva asti

original: atha yānītarāṇi stotrāṇi teṣvātmane'nnādyamāgāyettasmādu teṣu varam vṛṇīta yam

analyzed: kāmam kāmayeta tam saḥ eṣaḥ evamvid udgātā ātmane vā yajamānāya vā yam kāmam

original: kāmayate tamāgāyati taddhaitallokajideva na haivālokyatāyā āśāsti ya evametatsāma
analyzed: kāmayate tam āgāyati tat ha etat loka jit eva na ha eva a lokya tāyai āśāsti yaḥ evam etat sāma
veda

original: ātmaivedamagra āsīt puruṣavidhaḥ so'nuvīkṣya

analyzed: mantritaḥ aham ayam iti eva agre uktvā atha anyat nāma prabrūte yat asya bhavati

analyzed: yaḥ asmāt pūrvaḥ bubhūṣati yaḥ evam veda

original: bhavati 14.4.2.[4]

original: sa vai naiva reme tasmādekākī na ramate sa dvitīyamaicatsa haitāvānāsa yathā
analyzed: sa vai na eva reme tasmāt ekākī na ramate sa dvitīyam aicat sa ha etāvān āsa yathā

original: athetyabhyamanthat sa mukhācca yonerhastābhyāṃ cāgnimasṛjata

original: caivānnādaśca soma evānnamagnirannādaḥ 14.4.2.[14]

original: taddhedaṃ tarhyavyākṛtamāsīt tannāmarūpābhyāmeva

original: vyākriyatāsaunāmāyamidaṃrūpa iti tadidamapyetarhi nāmarūpābhyāmeva

original: vyākriyate'saunāmāyamidaṃrūpa iti 14.4.2.[16]
analyzed: vyākriyate asau nāmā ayam idaṃrūpaḥ iti

original: sa eṣa iha praviṣṭaḥ ā nakhāgrebhyo yathā kṣuraḥ kṣuradhāne'vahitaḥ

original: syādviśvambharo vā viśvambharakulāye taṃ na paśyantyakṛtsno hi saḥ 14.4.2.[17]
analyzed: syāt viśvambharaḥ vā viśvambhara kulāye tam na paśyanti akṛtsnaḥ hi saḥ

original: prāṇanneva prāṇo nāma bhavati vadanvākpaśyaṃścakṣuḥ śṛṇvañcrotram manvāno

original: manastānyasyaitāni karmanāmānyeva sa yo'ta ekaikamupāste na sa vedākṛtsno

original: hyeṣo'ta ekaikena bhavati 14.4.2.[18]
analyzed: hi eṣaḥ atas ekaikena bhavati

original: ātmetyevopāsīta atra hyete sarva ekam bhavanti tadetatpadanīyamasya sarvasya
analyzed: ātmā iti eva upāsīta atra hi ete sarve ekam bhavanti tat etat padanīyam asya sarvasya

original: yadayamātmānena hyetatsarvam veda yathā ha vai padenānuvindedevaṃ kīrtiṃ
analyzed: yat ayam ātmā anena hi etat sarvam veda yathā ha vai padena anuvindet evam kīrtim

original: ślokam vindate ya evam veda 14.4.2.[19]
analyzed: ślokam vindate yaḥ evam veda

original: tadetatpreyaḥ putrāt preyo vittātpreyo'nyasmātsarvasmādantarataraṃ yadayamātmā sa
analyzed: tat etat preyaḥ putrāt preyaḥ vittāt preyaḥ anyasmāt sarvasmāt antarataram yat ayam ātmā sa

original: yo'nyamātmanaḥ priyam bruvāṇam brūyātpriyaṃ rotsyatītīśvaro ha tathaiva
analyzed: yaḥ anyam ātmanaḥ priyam bruvāṇam brūyāt priyam rotsyati iti īśvaraḥ ha tathā eva

original: syādātmānameva priyamupāsīta sa ya ātmānameva priyamupāste na hāsya priyam
analyzed: syāt ātmānam eva priyam upāsīta sa yaḥ ātmānam eva priyam upāste na ha asya priyam

original: pramāyukam bhavati 14.4.2.[20]
analyzed: pramāyukam bhavati

original: tadāhuḥ yadbrahmavidyayā sarvam bhaviṣyanto manuṣyā manyante kimu
analyzed: tat āhuḥ yat brahma vidyayā sarvam bhaviṣyantaḥ manuṣyāḥ manyante kimu

original: tadbrahmāvedyasmāttatsarvamabhavaditi 14.4.2.[21]
analyzed: tat brahma avet yasmāt tat sarvam abhavat iti

original: brahma vā idamagra āsīt tadātmānamevāvedaham brahmāsmīti
analyzed: brahma vai idam agre āsīt tat ātmānam eva avet aham brahma asmi iti

original: tasmāttatsarvamabhavattadyo-yo devānām pratyabudhyata sa eva

original: tadabhavattatharṣīṇāṃ tathā manuṣyāṇām 14.4.2.[22]
analyzed: tat abhavat tathā ṛṣīṇām tathā manuṣyāṇām

original: taddhaitatpaśyannṛṣirvāmadevaḥ pratipede aham manurabhavaṃ sūryaśceti

original: tadidamapyetarhi ya evam vedāham brahmāsmīti sa idaṃ sarvam bhavati tasya ha na

original: devāścanābhūtyā īśata ātmā hyeṣāṃ sa bhavatyatha yo'nyāṃ
analyzed: devāḥ cana ābhūtyai īśate ātmā hi eṣām sa bhavati atha yaḥ anyām

original: devatāmupāste'nyo'sāvanyo'hamasmīti na sa veda yathā paśurevaṃ sa devānāṃ yathā
analyzed: devatām upāste anyaḥ asau anyaḥ aham asmi iti na sa veda yathā paśuḥ evam sa devānām yathā

original: ha vai bahavaḥ paśavo manuṣyam bhuñjyurevamekaikaḥ puruṣo
analyzed: ha vai bahavaḥ paśavaḥ manuṣyam bhuñjyuḥ evam ekaikaḥ puruṣaḥ

original: devānbhunaktyekasminneva paśāvādīyamāne'priyam bhavati kimu bahuṣu
analyzed: devān bhunakti ekasmin eva paśau ādīyamāne apriyam bhavati kimu bahuṣu

original: tasmādeṣāṃ tanna priyam yadetanmanuṣyā vidyuḥ 14.4.2.[23]
analyzed: tasmāt eṣām tat na priyam yat etat manuṣyāḥ vidyuḥ

original: brahma vā idamagra āsīt ekameva tadekaṃ sanna vyabhavattacreyo rūpamatyasṛjata

original: kṣīyate tadetannabhyaṃ yadayamātmā pradhirvittaṃ tasmādyadyapi sarvajyāniṃ

original: jīyata ātmanā cejjīvati pradhināgādityāhuḥ 14.4.3.[24]
analyzed: jīyate ātmanā ced jīvati pradhi nāgāt iti āhuḥ

original: atha trayo vāva lokāḥ manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko devaloka iti so'yam manuṣyalokaḥ
analyzed: atha trayaḥ vāva lokāḥ manuṣya lokaḥ pitṛ lokaḥ deva lokaḥ iti saḥ ayam manuṣya lokaḥ

original: putreṇaiva jayyo nānyena karmaṇā pitṛloko vidyayā devaloko devaloko vai lokānāṃ
analyzed: putreṇa eva jayyaḥ na anyena karmaṇā pitṛ lokaḥ vidyayā deva lokaḥ deva lokaḥ vai lokānām

original: śreṣṭhastasmādvidyām praśaṃsanti 14.4.3.[25]
analyzed: śreṣṭhaḥ tasmāt vidyām praśaṃsanti

original: athātaḥ samprattiḥ yadā praiṣyanmanyate'tha putramāha tvam brahma tvaṃ
analyzed: atha atas samprattiḥ yadā praiṣyan manyate atha putram āha tvam brahma tvam

original: yajñastvaṃ loka iti sa putraḥ pratyāhāham brahmāhaṃ yajño'haṃ loka iti 14.4.3.[26]
analyzed: yajñaḥ tvam lokaḥ iti sa putraḥ pratyāha aham brahmā aham yajñaḥ aham lokaḥ iti

original: yadvai kiṃ cānūktam tasya sarvasya brahmetyekatā ye vai ke ca yajñāsteṣāṃ
analyzed: yat vai kim ca anūktam tasya sarvasya brahma iti ekatā ye vai ke ca yajñāḥ teṣām

original: sarveṣāṃ yajña ityekatā ye vai ke ca lokāsteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ loka ityekataitāvadvā idaṃ
analyzed: sarveṣām yajñaḥ iti ekatā ye vai ke ca lokāḥ teṣām sarveṣām lokaḥ iti ekatā etāvat vai idam

original: sarvametanmā sarvaṃ sannayamito bhunajaditi tasmātputramanuśiṣṭaṃ
analyzed: sarvam etat mā sarvam san ayam itas bhunajat iti tasmāt putram anuśiṣṭam

original: lokyamāhustasmādenamanuśāsati sa yadaivaṃvidasmāllokātpraityathaibhireva prāṇaiḥ
analyzed: lokyam āhuḥ tasmāt enam anuśāsati sa yadā evaṃvid asmāt lokāt praiti atha ebhiḥ eva prāṇaiḥ

original: saha putramāviśati sa yadyanena kiṃcidakṣṇayākṛtam bhavati tasmādenaṃ
analyzed: saha putram āviśati sa yadi anena kiṃcid akṣṇayākṛtam bhavati tasmāt enam

original: sarvasmātputro muñcati tasmātputro nāma sa putreṇaivāsmiṃloke
analyzed: sarvasmāt putraḥ muñcati tasmāt putraḥ nāma sa putreṇa eva asmin loke

original: pratitiṣṭhatyathainamete daivāḥ prāṇā amṛtā āviśanti 14.4.3.[27]
analyzed: pratitiṣṭhati atha enam ete daivāḥ prāṇāḥ amṛtāḥ āviśanti

original: pṛthivyai cainamagneśca daivī vāgāviśati sā vai daivī vāgyayā yadyadeva vadati
analyzed: pṛthivyai ca enam agneḥ ca daivī vāc āviśati sā vai daivī vāgyayā yat yat eva vadati

original: tattadbhavati 14.4.3.[28]
analyzed: tat tat bhavati

original: divaścainamādityācca daivam mana āviśati tadvai daivam mano yenānandyeva
analyzed: divaḥ ca enam ādityāt ca daivam manaḥ āviśati tat vai daivam manaḥ yena ānandya iva

original: bhavatyatho na śocati 14.4.3.[29]
analyzed: bhavati atha u na śocati

original: adbhyaścainaṃ candramasaśca daivaḥ prāṇa āviśati sa vai daivaḥ prāṇo yaḥ
analyzed: adbhyaḥ ca enam candramasaḥ ca daivaḥ prāṇaḥ āviśati sa vai daivaḥ prāṇaḥ yaḥ

original: saṃcaraṃścāsaṃcaraṃśca na vyathate'tho na riśyati sa eṣa evaṃvitsarveṣām
analyzed: saṃcaran ca a saṃcaran ca na vyathate atha u na riśyati saḥ eṣaḥ evaṃvid sarveṣām

original: bhūtānāmātmā bhavati yathaiṣā devataivaṃ sa yathaitāṃ devatāṃ sarvāṇi
analyzed: bhūtānām ātmā bhavati yathā eṣā devatā evam sa yathā etām devatām sarvāṇi

original: bhūtānyavantyevaṃ haivaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavanti yadu kiṃ cemāḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: bhūtāni avanti evam ha evaṃvidam sarvāṇi bhūtāni avanti yat u kim ca imāḥ prajāḥ

original: śocantyamaivāsāṃ tadbhavati puṇyamevāmuṃ gacati na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacati 14.4.3.[30]
analyzed: śocanti amā eva āsām tat bhavati puṇyam eva amum gacati na ha vai devān pāpam gacati

original: athāto vratamīmāṃsā prajāpatirha karmāṇi sasṛje tāni sṛṣṭānyanyo'nyenāspardhanta
analyzed: atha atas vrata mīmāṃsā prajāpatiḥ ha karmāṇi sasṛje tāni sṛṣṭāni anyaḥ anyena aspardhanta

original: vadiṣyāmyevāhamiti vāgdadhre drakṣyāmyahamiti cakṣuḥ śroṣyāmyahamiti
analyzed: vadiṣyāmi eva aham iti vāc dadhre drakṣyāmi aham iti cakṣuḥ śroṣyāmi aham iti

original: śrotramevamanyāni karmāṇi yathākarma 14.4.3.[31]
analyzed: śrotram evam anyāni karmāṇi yathākarma

original: tāni mṛtyuḥ śramo bhūtvopayeme tānyāpnottānyāptvā mṛtyuravārunddha
analyzed: tāni mṛtyuḥ śramaḥ bhūtvā upayeme tāni āpnot tāni āptvā mṛtyuḥ avārunddha

original: tasmācrāmyatyeva vākśrāmyati cakṣuḥ śrāmyati śrotramathemameva nāpnodyo'yam
analyzed: tasmāt ācrāmyati eva vāc śrāmyati cakṣuḥ śrāmyati śrotram atha imam eva na āpnot yaḥ ayam

original: madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ 14.4.3.[32]
analyzed: madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ

original: tāni jñātuṃ dadhrire 'yaṃ vai naḥ śreṣṭho yaḥ saṃcaraṃścāsaṃcaraṃśca na
analyzed: tāni jñātum dadhrire ayam vai naḥ śreṣṭhaḥ yaḥ saṃcaran ca a saṃcaran ca na

original: vyathate'tho na riṣyati hantāsyaiva sarve rūpam bhavāmeti ta etasyaiva sarve
analyzed: vyathate atha u na riṣyati hantā asya eva sarve rūpam bhavāma iti te etasya eva sarve

original: rūpamabhavaṃstasmādeta etenākhyāyante prāṇā iti tena ha vāva tatkulamākhyāyate
analyzed: rūpam abhavan tasmāt ete etena ākhyāyante prāṇāḥ iti tena ha vāva tat kulam ākhyāyate

original: yasminkule bhavati ya evaṃ veda ya u haivaṃvidā spardhate'nuśuṣya haivāntato
analyzed: yasmin kule bhavati yaḥ evam veda yaḥ u ha evaṃvidā spardhate anuśuṣya ha eva antatas

original: mriyata ityadhyātmam 14.4.3.[33]
analyzed: mriyate iti adhyātmam

original: athādhidevataṃ jvaliṣyāmyevāhamityagnirdadhre tapsyāsyahamityādityo
analyzed: atha adhidevatam jvaliṣyāmi eva aham iti agniḥ dadhre tapsyāsi aham iti ādityaḥ

original: bhāsyāmyahamiti candramā evamanyā devatā yathādevataṃ sa yathaiṣām prāṇānām
analyzed: bhāsyāmi aham iti candramāḥ evam anyāḥ devatāḥ yathādevatam sa yathā eṣām prāṇānām

original: madhyamaḥ prāṇa evametāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyurmlocanti hyanyā devatā na vāyuḥ
analyzed: madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ evam etāsām devatānām vāyuḥ mlocanti hi anyāḥ devatāḥ na vāyuḥ

original: saiṣānastamitā devatā yadvāyuḥ 14.4.3.[34]
analyzed: sā eṣā an astamitā devatā yat vāyuḥ

original: athaiṣa śloko bhavati yataścodeti sūryo'staṃ yatra ca gacatīti prāṇādvā eṣa udeti
analyzed: atha eṣa ślokaḥ bhavati yatas ca udeti sūryaḥ astam yatra ca gacati iti prāṇāt vai eṣaḥ udeti

original: prāṇe'stameti taṃ devāścakrire dharmaṃ sa evādya sa u śva iti yadvā
analyzed: prāṇe astam eti tam devāḥ cakrire dharmam saḥ eva adya saḥ u śvas iti yat vā

original: ete'murhyadhriyanta tadevāpyadya kurvanti tasmādekameva vrataṃ
analyzed: ete amurhi adhriyanta tat eva api adya kurvanti tasmāt ekam eva vratam

original: caretprāṇyāccaivāpānyācca nenmā pāpmā mṛtyurāpnavaditi yadyu
analyzed: caret prāṇyāt ca eva apānyāt ca na id mā pāpmā mṛtyuḥ āpnavat iti yadi u

analyzed: caret samāpipayiṣet tena u etasyai devatāyai sāyujyam salokatām jayati yaḥ evam veda

original: trayaṃ vā idaṃ nāma rūpaṃ karma teṣāṃ nāmnāṃ vāgityetadeṣāmukthamato hi

analyzed: sarvāṇi nāmāni uttiṣṭhanti etat eṣām sāma etat hi sarvaiḥ nāmabhiḥ samam etat eṣām

original: brahmaitaddhi sarvāṇi nāmāni bibharti 14.4.4.[2]
analyzed: brahma etat hi sarvāṇi nāmāni bibharti

analyzed: atha rūpāṇām cakṣuḥ iti etat eṣām uktham atas hi sarvāṇi rūpāṇi uttiṣṭhanti etat eṣām

original: sāmaitaddhi sarvai rūpaiḥ samametadeṣām brahmaitaddhi sarvāṇi rūpāṇi bibharti 14.4.4.[3]
analyzed: sāma etat hi sarvaiḥ rūpaiḥ samam etat eṣām brahma etat hi sarvāṇi rūpāṇi bibharti

original: atha karmaṇām ātmetyetadeṣāmukthamato hi sarvāṇi karmāṇyuttiṣṭhantyetadeṣāṃ

analyzed: sāma etat hi sarvaiḥ karmabhiḥ samam etat eṣām brahma etat hi sarvāṇi karmāṇi

analyzed: bibharti tat etat trayam sat eka mayam ātmā ātmā ekaḥ san etat trayam tat etat amṛtam

analyzed: dṛptabālākiḥ ha anūcānaḥ gārgyaḥ āsa sa ha uvāca ajātaśatrum kāśyam brahma te bravāṇi iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatruḥ sahasrametasyāṃ vāci dadmo janako janaka iti vai janā dhāvantīti 14.5.1.[2]
analyzed: ha uvāca ajātaśatruḥ sahasram etasyām vāci dadmaḥ janakaḥ janakaḥ iti vai janāḥ dhāvanti iti

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāsāvāditye puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa

original: rājeti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa yaetamevamupāste'tiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣām bhūtānām
analyzed: rājā iti vai aham etam upāse iti sa yaḥ etam evam upāste atiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣām bhūtānām

original: mūrdhā rājā bhavati 14.5.1.[3]
analyzed: mūrdhā rājā bhavati

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāsau candre puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā bṛhanpāṇḍaravāsāḥ somo rājeti vā

analyzed: aham etam upāse iti sa yaḥ etam evam upāste ahar ahar ha sutaḥ prasutaḥ bhavati na asya annam

original: kṣīyate 14.5.1.[4]
analyzed: kṣīyate

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyaṃ vidyuti puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhāstejasvīti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya

original: etamevamupāste tejasvī ha bhavati tejasvinī hāsya prajā bhavati 14.5.1.[5]

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyamākāśe puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa

analyzed: ha uvāca ajātaśatruḥ mā mā etasmin saṃvadiṣṭhāḥ pūrṇam a pravarti iti vai aham etam upāse iti

original: sa ya etamevamupāste pūryate prajayā paśubhirnāsyāsmāllokātprajodvartate 14.5.1.[6]
analyzed: sa yaḥ etam evam upāste pūryate prajayā paśubhiḥ na asya asmāt lokāt prajā udvartate

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyaṃ vāyau puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ eva ayam vāyau puruṣaḥ etam eva aham brahma upāse iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā indro vaikuṇṭho'parājitā seneti vā

original: ahametamupāsa iti sa ya etamevamupāste jiṣṇurhāparājiṣṇurbhavatyanyatastyajāyī 14.5.1.[7]
analyzed: aham etam upāse iti sa yaḥ etam evam upāste jiṣṇuḥ ha aparājiṣṇuḥ bhavati anyatas tya jāyī

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyamagnau puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ eva ayam agnau puruṣaḥ etam eva aham brahma upāse iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā viṣāsahiriti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyamapsu puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyamādarśe puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa

original: sarvāṃstānatirocate 14.5.1.[10]

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā dvitīyo'napaga iti vā ahametamupāsa iti

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyaṃ yantam paścācabdo'nūdaityetamevāham brahmopāsa iti
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ eva ayam yantam paścācabdaḥ anūdaiti etam eva aham brahma upāse iti

original: sa hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā asuriti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā mṛtyuriti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya

original: kvāyaṃ tadā puruṣo bhavatītyāhara saumya hastam 14.6.2.[14]

original: ārtabhāgeti hovāca āvamevaitadvediṣyāvo na nāvetatsajana iti tau hotkrasya
analyzed: ārtabhāga iti ha uvāca āvām eva etat vediṣyāvaḥ na nau etat sa jane iti tau ha utkrasya

original: mantrayāṃ cakratustau ha yadūcatuḥ karma haiva tadūcaturatha ha yatpraśaśaṃsatuḥ
analyzed: cakratuḥ tau ha yat ūcatuḥ karma ha eva tat ūcatuḥ atha ha yat praśaśaṃsatuḥ

original: karma haiva tatpraśaśaṃsatuḥ puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpeneti tato
analyzed: karma ha eva tat praśaśaṃsatuḥ puṇyaḥ vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpena iti

original: ha jāratkārava ārtabhāga upararāma 14.6.3.[1]
analyzed: ha jāratkāravaḥ ārtabhāgaḥ upararāma

original: atha hainam bhujyurlāhyāyaniḥ papraca yājñavalkyeti hovāca madreṣu carakāḥ
analyzed: atha ha enam bhujyuḥ lāhyāyaniḥ papraca yājñavalkya iti ha uvāca madreṣu carakāḥ

original: paryavrajāma te etañcalasya kāpyasya gṛhānaima tasyāsīdduhitā gandharvagṛhītā
analyzed: paryavrajāma te etañcalasya kāpyasya gṛhān aima tasya āsīt duhitā gandharva gṛhītā

original: tamapṛcāma ko'sīti so'bravītsudhanvāṅgirasa iti taṃ yadā
analyzed: tam apṛcāma kaḥ asi iti saḥ abravīt sudhanvā āṅgirasaḥ iti tam yadā

original: lokānāmantānapṛcāmāthaitamabrūma kva pārikṣitā abhavankva pārikṣitā
analyzed: lokānām antān apṛcāma atha etam abrūma kva pārikṣitāḥ abhavan kva pārikṣitā

original: abhavanniti tattvā pṛcāmi yājñavalkya kva pārikṣitā abhavanniti 14.6.3.[2]
analyzed: abhavan iti tat tvā pṛcāmi yājñavalkya kva pārikṣitāḥ abhavan iti

original: sa hovāca uvāca vai sa tadagacanvai te tatra yatrāśvamedhayājino gacantīti kva
analyzed: sa ha uvāca uvāca vai sa tat agacan vai te tatra yatra aśvamedha yājinaḥ gacanti iti kva

original: nvaśvamedhayājino gacantīti dvātriṃśataṃ vai devarathāhnūyānyayaṃ lokastaṃ
analyzed: nu aśvamedha yājinaḥ gacanti iti dvātriṃśatam vai deva rathā ahnūyāni ayam lokaḥ tam

original: samantaṃ lokaṃ dvistāvatpṛthivī paryeti tām pṛthivīṃ dvistāvatsamudraḥ paryeti
analyzed: samantam lokam dvis tāvat pṛthivī paryeti tām pṛthivīm dvis tāvat samudraḥ paryeti

original: tadyāvatī kṣurasya dhārā yāvadvā makṣikāyāḥ patraṃ tāvānantareṇākāśastānindraḥ
analyzed: tat yāvatī kṣurasya dhārā yāvat vā makṣikāyāḥ patram tāvān antareṇa ākāśaḥ tān indraḥ

original: suparṇo bhūtvā vāyave prāyacattānvāyurātmani dhitvā tatrāgamayadyatra pārikṣitā
analyzed: suparṇaḥ bhūtvā vāyave prāyacat tān vāyuḥ ātmani dhitvā tatra agamayat yatra pārikṣitā

original: abhavannityevamiva vai sa vāyumeva praśaśaṃsa tasmādvāyureva vyaṣṭirvāyuḥ
analyzed: abhavan iti evam iva vai sa vāyum eva praśaśaṃsa tasmāt vāyuḥ eva vyaṣṭiḥ vāyuḥ

original: samaṣṭirapa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti ya evaṃ veda tato ha
analyzed: samaṣṭiḥ apa punarmṛtyum jayati sarvam āyuḥ eti yaḥ evam veda tatas ha

original: bhujyurlāhyāyanirupararāma 14.6.4.
analyzed: bhujyuḥ lāhyāyaniḥ upararāma

original: atha hainaṃ kahoḍaḥ kauṣītakeyaḥ papraca yājñavalkyeti hovāca
analyzed: atha ha enam kahoḍaḥ kauṣītakeyaḥ papraca yājñavalkya iti ha uvāca

original: yatsākṣādaparokṣādbrahma ya ātmā sarvāntarastam me vyācakṣvetyeṣa ta ātmā
analyzed: yat sākṣāt aparokṣāt brahma yaḥ ātmā sarva antaraḥ tam me vyācakṣva iti eṣa te ātmā

original: sarvāntaraḥ katamo yājñavalkya sarvāntaro yo'ṣanāyāpipāse śokam mohaṃ jarām
analyzed: sarva antaraḥ katamaḥ yājñavalkya sarva antaraḥ yaḥ aṣanāyā pipāse śokam moham jarām

original: mṛtyumatyetyetaṃ vai tamātmānaṃ viditvā brāhmaṇāḥ putraiṣaṇāyāśca vittaiṣaṇāyāśca
analyzed: mṛtyum atyeti etam vai tam ātmānam viditvā brāhmaṇāḥ putra eṣaṇāyāḥ ca vitta eṣaṇāyāḥ ca

original: lokaiṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti yā hyeva putraiṣaṇā sā vittaiṣaṇā
analyzed: loka eṣaṇāyāḥ ca vyutthāya atha bhikṣā caryam caranti yā hi eva putra eṣaṇā sā vitta eṣaṇā

original: yā vittaiṣaṇā sā lokaiṣaṇobhe hyete eṣaṇe eva bhavatastasmātpaṇḍitaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ
analyzed: yā vitta eṣaṇā sā loka eṣaṇā ubhe hi ete eṣaṇe eva bhavataḥ tasmāt paṇḍitaḥ pāṇḍityam

original: nirvidya bālyena tiṣṭhāsedbālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniramaunaṃ ca
analyzed: nirvidya bālyena tiṣṭhāset bālyam ca pāṇḍityam ca nirvidya atha muniḥ amaunam ca

original: maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇaḥ sa brāhmaṇaḥ kena syādyena syāttenedṛśa eva
analyzed: maunam ca nirvidya atha brāhmaṇaḥ sa brāhmaṇaḥ kena syāt yena syāt tena īdṛśaḥ eva

original: bhavati ya evaṃ veda tato ha kahoḍaḥ kauṣītakeya upararāma 14.6.5
analyzed: bhavati yaḥ evam veda tatas ha kahoḍaḥ kauṣītakeyaḥ upararāma

original: atha hainamuṣastaścākrāyaṇaḥ papraca yājñavalkyeti hovāca
analyzed: atha ha enam uṣastaḥ cākrāyaṇaḥ papraca yājñavalkya iti ha uvāca

original: yatsākṣādaparokṣādbrahma ya ātmā sarvāntarastam me vyācakṣvetyeṣa ta ātmā
analyzed: yat sākṣāt aparokṣāt brahma yaḥ ātmā sarva antaraḥ tam me vyācakṣva iti eṣa te ātmā

original: sarvāntaraḥ katamo yājñavalkya sarvāntaro yaḥ prāṇena prāṇiti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaro
analyzed: sarva antaraḥ katamaḥ yājñavalkya sarva antaraḥ yaḥ prāṇena prāṇiti sa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ

original: yo'pānenāpāniti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaro yo vyānena vyaniti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaro ya
analyzed: yaḥ apānena apāniti sa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ yaḥ vyānena vyaniti sa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ yaḥ

original: udānenodaniti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaro yaḥ samānena samaniti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ sa
analyzed: udānena udaniti sa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ yaḥ samānena samaniti sa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ sa

original: hovācoṣastaścākrāyaṇo yathā vai brūyādasau gaurasāvaśva
analyzed: ha uvāca uṣastaḥ cākrāyaṇaḥ yathā vai brūyāt asau gauḥ asau aśva

original: ityevamevaitadvyapadiṣṭam bhavati yadeva sākṣādaparokṣādbrahma ya ātmā
analyzed: iti evam eva etat vyapadiṣṭam bhavati yat eva sākṣāt aparokṣāt brahma yaḥ ātmā

analyzed: sarva antaraḥ tam me vyācakṣva iti eṣa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ katamaḥ yājñavalkya

original: sarvāntaro na dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāram paśyerna śruteḥ śrotāraṃ śṛṇuyā na matermantāram
analyzed: sarva antaraḥ na dṛṣṭeḥ draṣṭāram paśyeḥ na śruteḥ śrotāram śṛṇuyāḥ na mateḥ mantāram

original: manvīthā na vijñātervijñātāraṃ vijñānīyā eṣa ta ātmā sarvāntaro'to'nyadārtaṃ tato
analyzed: manvīthāḥ na vijñāteḥ vijñātāram vijñānīyāḥ eṣa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ atas anyat ārtam

original: hoṣastaścākrāyaṇa upararāma 14.6.6.
analyzed: ha uṣastaḥ cākrāyaṇaḥ upararāma

original: atha hainaṃ gārgī vācaknavī papraca yājñavalkyeti hovāca yaditaṃ sarvamapsvotaṃ
analyzed: atha ha enam gārgī vācaknavī papraca yājñavalkya iti ha uvāca yat itam sarvam apsu otam

original: ca protaṃ ca kasminnvāpa otāśca protaśceti vāyau gārgīti kasminnu vāyurotaśca
analyzed: ca protam ca kasmin nu āpaḥ otāḥ ca protaḥ ca iti vāyau gārgi iti kasmin nu vāyuḥ otaḥ ca

original: protaścetyākāśa eva gārgīti kasminnvākāśa otaśca protaścetyantarikṣalokeṣu gārgīti
analyzed: protaḥ ca iti ākāśe eva gārgi iti kasmin u ākāśaḥ otaḥ ca protaḥ ca iti antarikṣa lokeṣu gārgi iti

original: kasminnvantarikṣalokā otāśca protāśceti dyaurloke gārgīti kasminnu dyaurloka
analyzed: kasmin u antarikṣa lokāḥ otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti dyauḥ loke gārgi iti kasmin nu dyauḥ loke

original: otaśca protaścetyādityalokeṣu gārgīti kasminnvādityalokā otāśca protāśceti
analyzed: otaḥ ca protaḥ ca iti āditya lokeṣu gārgi iti kasmin u āditya lokāḥ otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti

original: candralokeṣu gārgīti kasminnu candralokā otāśca protāśceti nakṣatralokeṣu gārgīti
analyzed: candra lokeṣu gārgi iti kasmin nu candra lokāḥ otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti nakṣatra lokeṣu gārgi iti

original: kasminnu nakṣatralokā otāśca protāśceti devalokeṣu gārgīti kasminnu devalokā
analyzed: kasmin nu nakṣatra lokāḥ otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti deva lokeṣu gārgi iti kasmin nu deva lokā

original: otāśca protāśceti gandharvalokeṣu gārgīti kasminnu gandharvalokā otāśca protāśceti
analyzed: otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti gandharva lokeṣu gārgi iti kasmin nu gandharva lokāḥ otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti

original: prajāpatilokeṣu gārgīti kasminnu prajāpatilokā otāśca protāśceti brahmalokeṣu
analyzed: prajāpati lokeṣu gārgi iti kasmin nu prajāpati lokāḥ otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti brahma lokeṣu

original: gārgīti kasminnu brahmalokā otāśca protāśceti sa hovāca gārgi mātiprākṣīrmā te
analyzed: gārgi iti kasmin nu brahma lokāḥ otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti sa ha uvāca gārgi mā atiprākṣīḥ mā te

original: mūrdhā vyapaptadanatipraśnyā vai devatā atipṛcasi gārgi mātiprākṣīriti tato ha gārgī
analyzed: mūrdhā vyapaptat anatipraśnyāḥ vai devatāḥ atipṛcasi gārgi mā atiprākṣīḥ iti tatas ha gārgī

original: vācaknavyupararāma 14.6.7.[1]
analyzed: vācaknavī upararāma

original: atha hainamuddālaka āruṇiḥ papraca yājñavalkyeti hovāca madreṣvavasāma
analyzed: atha ha enam uddālakaḥ āruṇiḥ papraca yājñavalkya iti ha uvāca madreṣu avasāma

original: patañcalasya kāpyasya gṛheṣu yajñamadhīyānāstasyāsīdbhāryā gandharvagṛhītā
analyzed: patañcalasya kāpyasya gṛheṣu yajñam adhīyānāḥ tasya āsīt bhāryā gandharva gṛhītā

original: tamapṛcāma ko'sīti so'bravītkabandha ātharvaṇa iti 14.6.7.[2]
analyzed: tam apṛcāma kaḥ asi iti saḥ abravīt kabandhaḥ ātharvaṇaḥ iti

original: so'bravīt patañcalaṃ kāpyaṃ yājñikāṃśca vettha nu tvaṃ kāpya tatsūtraṃ yasminnayaṃ
analyzed: saḥ abravīt patañcalam kāpyam yājñikān ca vettha nu tvam kāpya tat sūtram yasmin ayam

original: ca lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavantīti so'bravītpatañcalaḥ
analyzed: ca lokaḥ paraḥ ca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti iti saḥ abravīt patañcalaḥ

original: kāpyo nāhaṃ tadbhagavanvedeti 14.6.7.[3]
analyzed: kāpyaḥ na aham tat bhagavan veda iti

original: so'bravīt patañcalaṃ kāpyaṃ yājñikāṃśca vettha nu tvaṃ kāpya tamantaryāmiṇaṃ ya
analyzed: saḥ abravīt patañcalam kāpyam yājñikān ca vettha nu tvam kāpya tam antaryāmiṇam yaḥ

original: imaṃ ca lokam paraṃ ca lokaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtānyantaro yamayatīti
analyzed: imam ca lokam param ca lokam sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni antaraḥ yamayati iti

original: so'bravītpatañcalaḥ kāpyo nāhaṃ tam bhagavanvedeti 14.6.7.[4]
analyzed: saḥ abravīt patañcalaḥ kāpyaḥ na aham tam bhagavan veda iti

original: so'bravīt patañcalaṃ kāpyaṃ yājñikāṃśca yo vai tatkāpya sūtraṃ vidyāttaṃ
analyzed: saḥ abravīt patañcalam kāpyam yājñikān ca yaḥ vai tat kāpya sūtram vidyāt tam

original: cāntaryāmiṇaṃ sa brahmavitsa lokavitsa devavitsa vedavitsa yajñavitsa bhūtavitsa
analyzed: ca antaryāmiṇam sa brahma vid sa loka vid sa deva vid sa veda vid sa yajña vid sa bhūta vid sa

original: ātmavitsa sarvaviditi tebhyo'bravīttadahaṃ veda taccettvaṃ yājñavalkya
analyzed: ātma vid sa sarva vid iti tebhyaḥ abravīt tat aham veda tat ced tvam yājñavalkya

original: sūtramavidvāṃstaṃ cāntaryāmiṇam brahmagavīrudajase mūrdhā te vipatiṣyatīti 14.6.7.[5]
analyzed: sūtram a vidvān tam ca antaryāmiṇam brahma gavīḥ udajase mūrdhā te vipatiṣyati iti

original: veda vā ahaṃ gautama tatsūtraṃ taṃ cāntaryāmiṇamiti yo vā idaṃ kaśca
analyzed: veda vai aham gautama tat sūtram tam ca antaryāmiṇam iti yaḥ vai idam kaḥ ca

original: brūyādveda-vedeti yathā vettha tathā brūhīti 14.6.7.[6]
analyzed: brūyāt veda veda iti yathā vettha tathā brūhi iti

original: vāyurvai gautama tatsūtram vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāyaṃ ca lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ
analyzed: vāyuḥ vai gautama tat sūtram vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇa ayam ca lokaḥ paraḥ ca lokaḥ

original: sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti tasmādvai gautama puruṣam
analyzed: sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti tasmāt vai gautama puruṣam

original: pretamāhurvyasraṃsiṣatāsyāṅgānīti vāyunā hi gautama sūtreṇa saṃdṛbdhāni
analyzed: pretam āhuḥ vyasraṃsiṣata asya aṅgāni iti vāyunā hi gautama sūtreṇa saṃdṛbdhāni

original: bhavantītyevamevaitadyājñavalkyāntaryāmiṇam brūhīti 14.6.7.[7]
analyzed: bhavanti iti evam eva etat yājñavalkya antaryāmiṇam brūhi iti

original: yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yam pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ pṛthivyām tiṣṭhan pṛthivyāḥ antaraḥ yam pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīram yaḥ

original: pṛthivīmantaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ 14.6.7.[8]
analyzed: pṛthivīm antaraḥ yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ

original: so'psu tiṣṭhan adbhyo'ntaro yamāpo na viduryasyāpaḥ śarīraṃ yo'po'ntaro yamayati
analyzed: saḥ apsu tiṣṭhan adbhyaḥ antaraḥ yam apaḥ na viduḥ yasya āpaḥ śarīram yaḥ apaḥ antaraḥ yamayati

original: sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ 14.6.7.[9]
analyzed: sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ

original: yo'gnau tiṣṭhan agnerantaro yamagnirna veda yasyāgniḥ śarīraṃ yo'gnimantaro
analyzed: yaḥ agnau tiṣṭhan agneḥ antaraḥ yam agniḥ na veda yasya agniḥ śarīram yaḥ agnim antaraḥ

original: yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ 14.6.7.[10]
analyzed: yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ

original: ya ākāśe tiṣṭhan ākāśādantaro yamākāśo na veda yasyākāśaḥ śarīraṃ ya
analyzed: yaḥ ākāśe tiṣṭhan ākāśāt antaraḥ yam ākāśaḥ na veda yasya ākāśaḥ śarīram yaḥ

original: ākāśamantaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ 14.6.7.[11]
analyzed: ākāśam antaraḥ yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ

original: yo vāyau tiṣṭhan vāyorantaro yaṃ vāyurna veda yasya vāyuḥ śarīraṃ yo
analyzed: yaḥ vāyau tiṣṭhan vāyoḥ antaraḥ yam vāyuḥ na veda yasya vāyuḥ śarīram yaḥ

original: vāyumantaro yama> 14.6.7.[12]
analyzed: vāyum antaraḥ yama

original: ya āditye tiṣṭhan ādityādantaro yamādityo na veda yasyādityaḥ śarīraṃ ya
analyzed: yaḥ āditye tiṣṭhan ādityāt antaraḥ yam ādityaḥ na veda yasya ādityaḥ śarīram yaḥ

original: ādityamantaro yama> 14.6.7.[13]
analyzed: ādityam antaras yama

original: yaścandratārake tiṣṭhan candratārakādantaro yaṃ candratārakaṃ na veda yasya
analyzed: yaḥ candra tārake tiṣṭhan candra tārakāt antaraḥ yam candra tārakam na veda yasya

original: candratārakaṃ śarīraṃ yaścandratārakamantaro yama> 14.6.7.[14]
analyzed: candra tārakam śarīram yaḥ candra tārakam antaraḥ yama

original: yo dikṣu tiṣṭhan digbhyo'ntaro yaṃ diśo na viduryasya diśaḥ śarīraṃ yo diśo'ntaro
analyzed: yaḥ dikṣu tiṣṭhan digbhyaḥ antaraḥ yam diśaḥ na viduḥ yasya diśaḥ śarīram yaḥ diśaḥ antaraḥ
yama

original: yo vidyuti tiṣṭhan vidyuto'ntaro yaṃ vidyunna veda yasya vidyucarīraṃ yo
analyzed: yaḥ vidyuti tiṣṭhan vidyutaḥ antaraḥ yam vidyut na veda yasya vidyu carīram yaḥ

original: vidyutamantaro yama> 14.6.7.[16]
analyzed: vidyutam antaraḥ yama

original: ya stanayitnau tiṣṭhan stanayitnorantaro yaṃ stanayitnurna veda yasya stanayitnuḥ
analyzed: ya stanayitnau tiṣṭhan stanayitnoḥ antaraḥ yam stanayitnuḥ na veda yasya stanayitnuḥ

original: śarīraṃ ya stanayitnumantaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛta
analyzed: śarīram yaḥ stanayitnum antaraḥ yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛta

original: ityadhidevatamathādhilokam 14.6.7.[17]
analyzed: iti adhidevatam atha adhilokam

original: yaḥ sarveṣu lokeṣu tiṣṭhan sarvebhyo lokebhyo'ntaro yaṃ sarve lokā na viduryasya
